articles.title: Function Held at Iranian Embassy
articles.content:
Function Held at Iranian Embassy
 Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- A function was held at the Iranian embassy here on Monday to lay a floral basket before the photo of President Kim Il Sung and Seyed Ali Khamenei, leader of the Islamic Revolution of Iran, on the occasion of the week of DPRK-Iran friendship for commemorating the 20th anniversary of the President's meeting with the Iranian leader.
					 Present there were Iranian Ambassador to the DPRK Morteza Moradian and staff members of the embassy and Jon Yong Jin, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who is also vice-chairman of the DPRK-Iran Friendship Association, and officials concerned.
					
					 The participants laid the floral basket before the photo at the embassy and made bows.
					
					 They had commemoration tree-planting in the garden of the embassy.

articles.title: Iranian Embassy Officials Visit Different Places
articles.content:
Iranian Embassy Officials Visit Different Places
 Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- Iranian Ambassador to the DPRK Morteza Moradian and staff members of his embassy Monday visited the Grand People's Study House on the occasion of the week of DPRK-Iran friendship for commemorating the 20th anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's meeting with Seyed Ali Khamenei, leader of the Islamic Revolution of Iran. 
					 They looked round various reading rooms and lecture rooms, being briefed on the fact that working people and youth and students acquire modern scientific and technological knowledge and increase cultural attainments at the house which was wonderfully built as the grand palace of learning for all the people.
					
					 Earlier, they visited Pyongyang University of Foreign Studies. 
					
					 At the end of the visit the ambassador wished the university greater success in its educational work, expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger. 
					
					 The ambassador donated scientific and technological books and teaching materials to the house and the university today.

articles.title: Demonstration of DPRK's Might by Scientists
articles.content:
Demonstration of DPRK's Might by Scientists
 Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- The artificial satellite Kwangmyongsong-2 which was developed by scientists and technicians of the DPRK entirely with their wisdom and technology is on a normal operation in its orbit.
					 This is a great demonstration of the country's might of applied space science and technology.
					
					 The science and technology of the country which started from tabula rasa after the liberation have become one of the three pillars for the building of a socialist economic power.
					
					 Since the foundation of Kim Il Sung University, the first university of the people, in October Juche 35 (1946), hundreds of universities have come into being, which have produced nearly 2 million intellectuals.
					
					 The number of holders of academic degrees and titles including academician, candidate academician, professor and doctor is increasing as the days go by and world-level talents in their 20s and 30s have been reared.
					
					 Scientists and technicians have reliably ensured the construction of the West Sea Barrage and other grand edifices and the production of modern large-sized machines such as 10,000 ton press and 18,000 cubic meter oxygen plant.
					
					 They have applied more than 69,000 technical innovations to production through the activities of the February 17 Shock Brigade of Scientists and Technicians every year, thus going a long way toward accelerating the Juche-orientation, modernization and scientification of the national economy.
					
					 They have developed many effective application programs needed for the technical modernization of the national economy.
					
					 Recent years have witnessed that a Korean-style UHP electric arc furnace was installed at the Chollima Steel Complex and a large-sized oxygen plant at the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex, making it possible to strengthen the Juche character and independence of the metal industry and to increase the iron and steel output of the country.
					
					 Now the scientists and technicians of the country are doing their bit in solving the scientific and technical issues arising in the building of a socialist economic power with indomitable spirit.

articles.title: DPRK Advancing toward Great, Prosperous and Powerful Nation
articles.content:
DPRK Advancing toward Great, Prosperous and Powerful Nation
Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- A vigorous 150-day campaign is afoot in the DPRK to make this year a vital one in flinging open the gate to a great, prosperous and powerful nation.
					 In response to the appeal of the Workers' Party of Korea calling the entire Party, the whole country and all the people to the 150-day campaign, rallies were held at working people's organizations, units, factories and enterprises, which were followed by a leaping progress and innovation in production and construction for all to become victors in the campaign.
					
					 Whenever the revolution faced a difficult and vast task in the past days, the WPK roused the whole army and all the people to a heroic campaign to give rise to an endless upswing in socialist construction.
					
					 Great heydays in the Workers' Party era were brought about in this land through 70-day and 100-day campaigns in the 1970s and a 200-day campaign in the 1980s.
					
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il visited the workers of Kangson toward the end of last year and kindled the torch of a new revolutionary upswing and then he has made journeys of thousands upon thousands of ri to every nook and corner of the country from the very beginning of the year, calling the army and people to a heroic campaign.
					
					 Keeping pace with him, the main factories and enterprises which are holding the key links and the lifeline in the building of the great, prosperous and powerful nation, are racing ahead in the van.
					
					 The Chollima Steel Complex is topping the daily quotas in the production of rails for narrow-gauged railroads which are needed in the main objects including the construction site of the Huichon Power Station.
					
					 The Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex is energetically pushing ahead with the repair of Furnace No.7 and technical preparations to open a bright prospect of Juche iron production while hastening current production. And the Chongjin Steel Works is stepping up in full scale the technical renovation of the process of Juche iron production.
					
					 The workers of the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex are boosting the daily output of pig iron, having completed the repair of Furnace No.2 before the set time. In the meantime, the Kumjingang Kuchang Power Station in South Hamgyong Province was put into operation earlier than schedule and began power production. Now an energetic drive is going on to hasten the commissioning of the power stations under construction including Ryesonggang Youth Power Station No. 2.
					
					 Coal mines of the western and northern areas such as Sunchon, Tokchon, Pukchang, Tukjang, Kaechon and Anju are reporting high results in coal production in the second quarter of the year following the first quarter.
					
					 A brisk drive is sweeping all sectors and units of the country to go beyond the production level of the peak year.

articles.title: Hammer Sound Ringing out of Bivouac
articles.content:
Hammering Sound Ringing out of Bivouac
Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- It happened one winter day of Juche 29 (1940) when the main unit of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army was marching to the boarder area along the River Tuman under the command of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The unit passed through a deep valley and went over a steep mountain before it crossed a frozen river.
					
					 Standing on the shore, the President gave precaution to the guerrillas and helped them to step on the ice by taking each man by hand.
					
					 Then a young orderly slipped and fell down on the ice.
					
					 The moment he watched his rifle and wrapped his face with two hands.
					
					 His rifle-stock was broken.
					
					 The President hurried to him and said with worry that it might be caused because of killing languor and a rest should be given to the men. 
					
					 Therefore, the unit set tents for rest.
					
					 Without resting for a while, the President ordered the machine-gun platoon leader to bring a tool bag and told in a gentle voice the orderly to show him the rifle.
					
					 After closely examining the broken rifle-stock without any words, he repaired the stock by heating iron-wire in a campfire and hammering iron-wire on it.
					
					 The hammering sound filled the hearts of guerrillas with the paternal love of the President.

articles.title: Lee Group of Traitors' Anti-DPRK Outbursts Slashed
articles.content:
Lee Group of Traitors' Anti-DPRK Outbursts Slashed
Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- Mandarins of the "Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Trade" of south Korea, when meeting an official of the U.S. administration on a recent visit to it, talked nonsense that "north's repeated steps are throwing hurdles in the way of the six-party talks" and "the north Korea-U.S. dialogue is not taking place due to the former", zealously supporting their American master. They also blustered that "the north will have to pay a due price in case it conducts a nuclear test."
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 The claim of the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors that it was due to the DPRK that the above-said talks were brought to collapse and there is no dialogue between the DPRK and the U.S. is nothing but sheer sophism.
					
					 The U.S. is wholly to blame for making the six-party talks needless and standing in the way of dialogue between the DPRK and the U.S. The group of traitors' absurd sophism can never work on anyone as it is aimed to blindly support the U.S. and shift the responsibility for what happened on to the DPRK, while being keen on sycophancy toward the U.S. and dependence on outsiders.
					
					 The Lee group's outbursts that "the north will have to pay a due price in case it conducts a nuclear test" are no more than brazen-faced remarks which remind one of a thief crying "stop the thief!"
					
					 Failing to draw a lesson, the group of traitors is still antagonizing compatriots, clinging to the coattails of foreign forces and fanning up the moves to deteriorate the situation. These foolish acts of the Lee group would only result in bedeviling the inter-Korean relations and sparking a war.
					
					 The DPRK will never allow the Lee group to do harm to the dignity and interests of the nation and bring dark clouds of a war of aggression against it, backed by the outsiders, but settle accounts with it for all the acts of treachery committed by it.
					
					 The group of traitors will only meet disgraceful destruction should it keep going reckless as a shock brigade for executing the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK despite its warnings.

articles.title: Truth behind Japs' Renaming "East Sea of Korea" "Sea of Japan" Probed
articles.content:
Truth behind Japs' Renaming "East Sea of Korea" "Sea of Japan" Probed
Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Monday carried an article contributed by Dr. Kim Thae Ryol in which he probed the truth behind Japan's criminal renaming of the "East Sea of Korea" "Sea of Japan." 
					 The article says that the historic origin of the designation of the "East Sea of Korea" and a historic change in its wording and the course of its development clearly prove that the efforts of Japan to rename the sea have no validity.
					
					 The article cites facts to prove this fact. It goes on:
					
					 No one can deny that the "East Sea of Korea" has been universally recognized as the designation is in full line with international usage and trend and the requirements of the norms set by the organizations for the standardization of international geographical designations.
					
					In view of historical usage, the designation of "East Sea" originates from the name of "East Sea" called by Koreans 2,200 years ago. It has been called so for at least 2,000 years since then. Up to this date it has been called "East Sea of Korea" as it was used to be called before.
					
					 The designation of the "Sea of Japan" is nothing but a bogus one as there is no ground to call the waters east of the Korean Peninsula as such in the light of the requirements of the norms for international geographical designation and international usage concerning the designation of seas and the trend of the times. 
					
					It was in about 670 that Japan appeared in the world by the name of "Japan." This was about 900 years later than the time Koreans called the sea "East Sea." Japanese called the waters east of Honshu of Japan "Sea of Japan" more than 1,900 years later than the time the designation of "East Sea" appeared in the world.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are persistently insisting on the renaming of the "East Sea of Korea" "Sea of Japan" in their criminal bid to use it as a springboard and a theatre of their activities from which to launch aggression and plunder of Korea and other countries in Northeast Asia, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The Korean nation will never allow Japan to rename the above-said sea "Sea of Japan." 
					
					 Any action to allow the above-said farce of the Japanese reactionaries would amount to encouraging them in their stepped-up moves for overseas expansion.
					
					 The International Hydrographic Organization which was abused for renaming the East Sea of Korea, the designation of the sea of the inviolable country, "Sea of Japan" by the cunning appeasement and deception of the Japanese imperialists in the last century has an unavoidable obligation to correctly settle the issue of the designation of the "East Sea."
					
					 The organization should fulfill its due responsibility to restore the original designation "East Sea of Korea," the only long-standing geographical designation of the waters off the Korean Peninsula, on the principle of impartiality, though belatedly, urges the article.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kwangju Popular Uprising Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kwangju Popular Uprising Observed
 Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- Though much water has flown under the bridge since the heroic Kwangju popular uprising of the south Korean people, the spirit and noble soul of the participants in the righteous uprising who fought courageously braving death live on and are powerfully inspiring the south Korean people in their dynamic struggle for independence against the U.S., democracy against dictatorship and for national reunification. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in a signed article dedicated to the 29th anniversary of the uprising.
					
					 The Kwangju popular uprising was a just resistance against the U.S. and fascism as its participants fought for national sovereignty, social democracy and the reunification of the country against the fascist rule of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean military gangsters and, at the same time, a massive armed uprising whose participants stood up in a do-or-die spirit against the merciless armed suppression by the dictatorial power, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The uprising taught a bitter lesson that the U.S. imperialists are not the "protectors" and "friends" of the south Korean people but the violators of sovereignty and democracy, ferocious aggressors and man-killers and it is quite impossible to achieve the independent development and progress of the society, national unity and reunification as long as such gang of robbers are allowed to go scot-free, and once a struggle is launched, it should be carried on dynamically to its victory and only by doing so is it possible to win a final victory. 
					
					 None of the desires of the resistance fighters in those days, ie an independent, democratic new society and national reunification has come true up to this date. 
					
					 The national dignity and sovereignty of the south Korean people are trampled down and democracy and human rights wantonly violated still today due to outsiders and traitors just as what happened 29 years back. 
					
					 The people from all walks of life in south Korea should intensify the struggle for independence against the U.S., the struggle for driving the U.S. imperialist aggressor troops out of south Korea, and disclose and condemn and thoroughly foil the moves of the group of traitors to increasingly depend on foreign forces in a bid to sacrifice the national interests to serve them. 
					
					 It is a law of history that justice is sure to win and no force on earth can hold in check the south Korean people's righteous struggle for independence, democracy and reunification.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Intensify Suppression of Patriotic Youths
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Intensify Suppression of Patriotic Youths
Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- The North Chungchong provincial branch of the puppet Intelligence Service and the North Chungchong provincial police office of south Korea handed the members of the Chongju Youth Association for Reunification detained on the charge of violation of the notorious "National Security Law" over to the puppet prosecution on May 15, according to "Yonhap News" of south Korea.
					 The puppet authorities took such action, charging that those members "printed and distributed literature praising the north, thus benefiting the enemy" and "disseminated the pro-north thought" while conducting activities after joining the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification and the south Korean Council of Youth Organizations defined as "enemy-benefiting organizations."
					
					 The authorities accused them of participating in the "illegal violent demonstrations" in April 2005 and in May 2006.
					
					 The puppet group's repressive campaign for stifling the reunification movement forces is now spreading across south Korea.

articles.title: DPRK's April Holidays Commemorated
articles.content:
DPRK's April Holidays Commemorated
Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- April holidays of Songun Korea were significantly commemorated by world progressives with great joy and excitement.
					 The three commanders of Mt. Paektu were awarded the honorary citizenship by the Pampas District Office of Tayacaja City, Huancavelica Province, Peru, and General Secretary Kim Jong Il was awarded the honorary title "Creator of Peace in the 21st Century" and the Order "Creator of Peace" first class by the Russian Federation of International Charity Organizations "World of Goodwill" and the honorary citizenship by Cotopaxi Province, Ecuador, on the occasion of the significant April holidays.
					
					 Kim Jong Il was presented with gifts by the president of the Vladivostok City Assembly and the mayor of Robnya City of Moscow Region in Russia and the mayor of Yangon City of Myanmar, the Syrian minister of Information and the economic delegation of the Vietnamese government, expressing their best wishes for him.
					
					 Functions were held by the Organization of Solidarity of the Peoples of Africa, Asia and Latin America and at Kim Il Sung Economic Special School of Cuba to lay floral baskets before the beaming images of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Floral baskets and bouquets were laid before the portraits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and full-length figure pictures of the peerlessly great men standing together displayed in DPRK missions abroad on behalf of political parties, ministries of governments, organizations and figures from all walks of life in relevant countries and regions.
					
					 The Mexican National Coordinating Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Nigerian Group for Self-Reliance Studies, the Guarico State, Venezuela, Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the African Taekwon-Do Federation were formed and at least 350 political and cultural events were held in more than 80 countries and at international and regional organizations in the significant month of April.
					
					 A printing house in Shenyang of China, a publishing house in Maritime Territory of Russia, a publishing house of Germany, the P.P. Publishing House of Peru, the Dar Al-Shaab Publishing House of Egypt, the Struggle for the Peace and Socialism of Italy, the Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association, the U.S. Group for the Study of Songun Politics, the Costa Rican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Egyptian newspaper Al-Ray, the Cambodian newspaper Kmae Amata and other newspapers and broadcasting services published or reported immortal famous works of the peerlessly great persons and brief biographies of their revolutionary activities.
					
					 Kim Jong Il received congratulatory messages from heads of political parties and state including the general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, the second secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba, the Russian president, the Mongolian president, the coordinator of the National Coordinating Committee of the Workers' Party of Mexico and the general secretary of the Al Ahd al Watani Party of Syria on his reelection as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission at the 1st session of the 12th Supreme People's Assembly. Floral baskets were presented to him by the Chinese government and the Syrian minister of Defence on the same occasion.

articles.title: Tiene lugar en embajada irani acto de semana de amistad Corea-Iran
articles.content:
Tiene lugar en embajada irani acto de semana de amistad Corea-Iran
Pyongyang, 18 de mayo (ATCC) -- En ocasion de la semana de amistad Corea-Iran iniciada en homenaje al 20o aniversario del encuentro entre el Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Lider de la Revolucion Islamica de Iran, Seyed Ali Khamenei, tuvo lugar el dia 18 en la Embajada de la Republica Islamica de Iran en Corea la ceremonia de colocacion del cesto de flores ante la foto de ambos lideres hallandose juntos.
					  En la ocasion estuvieron presentes el embajador Merteza Moradian y otros miembros de la embajada irani, Jon Yong Jin, vicepresidente del Comite Coreano de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero y de la Asociacion de Amistad Corea-Iran, y otros funcionarios coreanos.
					
					  Los participantes colocaron un cesto de flores ante la foto mencionada y rindieron tributo.
					
					  Luego, realizaron la plantacion conmemorativa en el jardin de la embajada.

articles.title: Cientificos quienes manifestaron el poderio de Corea
articles.content:
Cientificos quienes manifestaron el poderio de Corea
Pyongyang, 18 de mayo (ATCC) -- El satelite artificial "Kwangmyongsong No.2", que los cientificos y tecnicos coreanos lanzaron con su propia inteligencia y tecnologia, funciona normalmente en su orbita.
					  Esto es la gran manifestacion del poderio de la ciencia y tecnologia espaciales de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					  La ciencia y tecnologia de Corea que partieron sobre las ruinas despues de la liberacion (15 de agosto del 1945) sirven de uno de los 3 pilares para la construccion de la potencia economica socialista.
					
					  Desde cuando fue fundada en octubre del 35 (1946) de la Era Juche la Universidad  Kim Il Sung, primera universidad del pueblo hasta la fecha se construyeron centenares de universidades y se formaron mas o menos 2 millones de intelectuales.
					
					  Se aumenta con el paso de los dias el numero de personas con grado academico o categoria docente incluyendo academicos, candidatos a academicos, profesores y doctores titulares y salen las personas talentosas de fama mundial de 20 y 30 anos de edad.
					
					  Los cientificos y tecnicos garantizaron con seguridad en lo cientifico-tecnico la construccion del Complejo Hidraulico del Mar Oeste y otras grandes creaciones monumentales y la produccion de la prensa de 10 mil toneladas, el separador de oxigeno de 18 mil metros cubicos y otras maquinas modernas y equipos de gran tamano.
					
					  Ellos introdujeron cada ano en la produccion mas de 69 mil proyectos de innovacion tecnica librando las actividades de la "Brigada de los cientificos  y tecnicos 17 de febrero" y asi hicieron contribucion a acelerar la juchanizacion, la modernizacion y la cientifizacion de la economia nacional.
					
					  Y desarrollaron numerosos programas practicos con alta eficiencia necesarios a la reconstruccion tecnica de la economia nacional.
					
					\Al construirse recientemente en el Complejo de Acero Chollima el moderno horno electrico UHP al estilo coreano e instalarse en el Complejo Siderurgico Kim Chaek el separador de oxigeno de gran tamano fue fortalecido el espiritu jucheano y la independencia de la industria metalurgica y fue posible aumentar la produccion de materiales de acero e hierro del pais.
					
					  Hoy dia, los cientificos y tecnicos coreanos  con la indoblegable fuerza espiritual se encargan de la gran porcion en la solucion de los problemas cientifico-tecnicos que se presentan en la construccion de la potencia economica socialista.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun conmemora levantamiento popular de Kwangju
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun conmemora levantamiento popular de Kwangju
Pyongyang, 18 de mayo (ATCC) -- El diario Rodong Sinmun inserto en su edicion del dia 18 un articulo individual dedicado al aniversario 29 del heroico Levantamiento Popular de Kwangju del pueblo surcoreano.
					Aunque transcurrio el tiempo, los coreanos no olvidan los aspectos de lucha y el espiritu precioso de los sublevados honorables quienes lucharon valientemente sin temer la muerte en aquellos dias de hace decenas de anos, lo cual, hoy tambien, estimula energicamente a los habitantes surcoreanos a la lucha por lograr la independencia antiyanqui, la democratizacion anti-dictadura y la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					Asi comienza el articulista y prosigue:
					
					El Levantamiento Popular de Kwangju fue la justa sublevacion antiyanqui y antifascista para oponerse a la dominacion fascista de los imperialistas norteamericanos y los gangsteres militares del Sur de Corea y por lograr la soberania de la nacion, la democratizacion de la sociedad y la reunificacion del pais y fue la insurreccion armada masiva que se enfrento a riesgo de vida a la implacable represion armada del poder dictatorial.
					
					    El levantamiento dio lecciones de sangre de que los imperialistas yanquis no son "protectores" ni "amigos" sino verdugos de la soberania y la democracia, siniestros agresores y asesinos y de que mientras existen estos bandidos, no pueden realizar jamas el desarrollo independiente y el progreso de la sociedad, la unidad y la reunificacion de la nacion, hay que desplegar tenazmente hasta el fin la lucha una vez iniciada, y solo haciendolo asi pueden lograr la victoria final.
					
					  Hasta hoy, no se han logrado todavia la nueva sociedad independizada y democratizada ni la reunificacion del pais que deseaban tanto los valientes sublevados de Kwangju.
					
					  Tambien se ven violados despiadadamente la dignidad y la soberania de la nacion, la democracia y los derechos humanos de los habitantes surcoreanos por las fuerzas foraneas y los vendepatrias como aquel tiempo de hace 29 anos.
					
					  Los habitantes de distintos sectores del Sur de Corea deben avivar fuertemente las llamas de la lucha de independencia antiyanqui por expulsar a las tropas agresoras norteamericanas y frustrar cabalmente las maniobras dependientes de las fuerzas extranjeras de la banda de traidores que dana los intereses nacionales obedeciendo a aquellas fuerzas.
					
					  Triunfar la justicia es la ley de la historia y la lucha justa de los surcoreanos por la independencia, la democracia y la reunificacion no podra ser frenada por nada.

articles.title: Minju Joson denuncia a la banda de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
Minju Joson denuncia a la banda de Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 18 de mayo (ATCC) -- Recientemente, el ministro de "Relaciones Exteriores y del Comercio" del Sur de Corea y otros colaboradores del traidor Lee Myung Bak visitaron por separado al "delegado especial de la politica sobre el Norte de Corea" de Estados Unidos, de visita en el Sur de Corea, para conciliabulos con el. En las ocasiones le dijeron que "no se logra el dialogo Norte de Corea-EE.UU. debido al primero" y "en caso de que el Norte de Corea haga la prueba nuclear, pagaria el precio correspondiente al respecto" y otras cosas similares.
					  El diario Minju Joson en un comentario individual del dia 17 senala que tales palabras de los lacayos coloniales, que pretenden danar a los connacionales en contubernio con las fuerzas extranjeras, no tienen ningun valor de discutirlos, pero, hay la necesidad de aclarar la verdad de la situacion porque ellos intentan inducir en error la opinion publica interna y externa desempenando el papel de microfono de EE.UU.
					
					  La actual administracion de EE.UU. aboga por el "cambio" y la "diplomacia de cooperacion multilateral", por una parte y por la otra, sigue practicando la misma politica hostil a la RPDC de la administracion anterior, senala el comentarista y continua:
					
					  No se ha cambiado en lo minimo la ambicion de EE.UU. de aplastar a la RPDC con las fuerzas detras de la cortina del "dialogo". Lo sabe bien la banda de Lee Myung Bak.
					
					  A pesar de esto, esta banda repite la ilogica de EE.UU. como si fuera un papagayo, lo cual no es que ella falta de la firmeza sino toma la confrontacion fratricida por el modo de existencia. Actua con frenesi para aplastar a toda costa a los connacionales apoyandose en las fuerzas de EE.UU.
					
					  Aunque la banda de Lee, esbirro de EE.UU., lanza toda clase de disparates, la RPDC no cambiara su decision ya proclamada para defender la dignidad y la soberania de la nacion.
					
					  Fue y es invariable la posicion de principios de la RPDC de no abandonar la dignidad en las relaciones con EE.UU. y otros paises ni de ponerse de rodillas sino de responder con espada a la espada y con la benevolencia a la benevolencia.
					
					  Los que tocan la soberania de la RPDC no evitaran el severo castigo del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea y la banda de Lee tambien pagara el precio caro por sus maquinaciones de confrontacion fratricida.
					
					  Lee debe darse clara cuenta del respecto y poner fin de inmediato a su papel de lacayo de EE.UU.
